oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CSA Bonds
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Six Confederate bonds issued by the State of Tennessee and signed by Governor Isham G. Harris. Two CSA bonds are also included.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee Historical Society Civil War Collection, 1860-1982
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Civil War in the West; Civil War society; United States - History - 1783-1865; United States - History - 1849-1877; United States History - Civil War, 1861-1865
Civil Wars; War
